posts.post_content:
Gents, 

I have a few of these end panels in my collection and would like to add to them. 

Although i realize that they don't hold a ton of value being that they are a fraction of a card, I do find them to have excellent eye appeal etc... 

Open to buy or trade for hofers... I have some beatup t206 hofers that I would be willing to trade...

Especially looking for the following:
1-Tris Speaker 
2-Christy Mathewson
3-Cy Young

PM me with price if you have any of these guys that you are looking to part with. 

Thanks! 
David
